#include<stdio.h>
#include<vector>
#include<queue>
using namespace std;
#define FOR(i,a,b) for(int i=a; i<b; i++)

int size[100010];
int done[100010];
vector<int> adl[100010];
int main()
{
    int n,m,k,a,b,temp,count;
    scanf("%d%d%d",&n,&m,&k);
    count=n;
    queue<int> que;
    FOR(i,0,m)
    {
              scanf("%d%d",&a,&b);
              adl[a].push_back(b),adl[b].push_back(a);
              size[a]++,size[b]++;
              }
    FOR(i,0,n) if(size[i]<k) que.push(i),done[i]=1,count--;
    while(que.size())
    {
                     temp=que.front();
                     que.pop();
                     FOR(i,0,adl[temp].size()) size[adl[temp][i]]--;
                     FOR(i,0,adl[temp].size()) if(!done[adl[temp][i]])if(size[adl[temp][i]]<k) done[adl[temp][i]]=1,que.push(adl[temp][i]),count--;
                     }
    printf("%d",count);
    return 0;
}
